citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am to 12pm on
Sept. 10, 2024.
The inspector contacted the licensee by telephone upon arriving at the facility. The licensee advised that they were away
from the facility and would not be available for inspection within an hour, nor would any other facility representatives be
available for inspection within that time frame.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am to 12pm on 
Sept. 10, 2024.  
 
The inspector contacted the licensee by telephone upon arriving at the facility. The licensee advised that they were away 
from the facility and would not be available for inspection within an hour, nor would any other facility representatives be 
available for inspection within that time frame.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
